trends: There has been one other sighting in Buckhorn
There were no other sightings in Buckhorn on or around June 3rd 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsi was headn home from silver city on us hwy 180 west when i saw two orange spheres in frount of me just above the mountin range. they where there for about 3 min or so then they vanished.this is about the secound time i have seen this in that area.
